msbt.message: Yo, !
Hey! We were just talking about how to stay connected with a friend who lives somewhere far away.
Yeah, like You could both agree to go outside and look at the same star in the sky at the same time!
Whoa, that's a great idea!
Right? And then you could go inside and watch the same TV show at the same time.
Hmm. I liked the first part, but I'm not as sure about that
Why, what's wrong with that? Don't knock synchronized binge- watching until you've tried it. You can call each other every two minutes to nitpick the actors' performances and wardrobe
Well, I think books are more sophisticated.You can call each other every two minutes to discuss the author's plot choices!
Right? And then you can have an asynchronous dance-off!You film yourself doing a move and send it to the other person, and then they send one back!
I don't know I'm not sure how I feel about sending videos of myself dancing out into the world.
Aw, c'mon. Having no privacy is the new privacy!If everyone has videos out there of themselves being foolish, it's like no one does.
Thatalmost makes sense. I'm going to walk away before I subscribe to any more of your theories.
and that's why breakfast is better for dinner than it is for breakfast.

Butisn't breakfast still breakfast no matter what you're eating? And the same for dinner? You could have in the morning, and that still counts as your breakfast. Just like if you had pancakes for dinner. It's still dinner!
No, no, no It doesn't work like that. Pancakes are always breakfast, no matter when you eat them. Especially when you eat them for dinner. Wait, now I'm confused
It's OK, . Try not to worry your pretty little head about it too much.
So you see, it's easy to maintain a mysterious aura if you do completely unpredictable things occasionally. You catch my drift, ?
I don't know about that. I'd say it has more to do with having some real depth to your personality But I did like that thing you said just then. What was it? ?
Yeah, that's it. I dunno, it's just something I say sometimes.I used to think it made me sound sophisticated, but I guess I'm kinda bored with it lately.
Well, if you're bored with it anywaywould you mind terribly if I borrowed it? Ahem, let's see !<10_4 /> How was that?
Whoa! You made it cool again! I think I'm going to start using it more often too, !
